resources.string: There are no bikes around you. You should try resizing the home radius dragging the blue handle or checking \"View all\" in the options menu
Click to change your location providers (Network and GPS)
Manually find your city\'s bike network
Restart the app state as it was just installed (keeps the favorites)
Allow automatic network selection based on your current location
I can find a bike network for you, based on you position.\nOr.. you can select it manually from a list of networks. \nWhat would it be?
Please try again, or select a network from the list
Slide through the green arrow to reveal the bookmarks menu

With this version there's a new feature I would like to show you..
It consists on getting a notification when an empty station has a bike ready for you.
I know this app is not always easy to use, so I have made a tour just for you. You can always redo the tour through the settings menu.

So, would you like to see how it works?

If you selected an station which already had bikes, you have probably received a notification by now!

Assume you don't mind waiting for an station to have a bike for you. You might be on a cafe, or chatting with a friend. Using this, you don't need to be continuously checking for the status on that station, just wait for CityBikes to notify you through Google's awesome C2DM service, even if the application is closed!
You can add as many alarms as you want. When you receive a notification, all other alarms will be automatically cleared.

This is an EXPERIMENTAL alpha feature.

If you want to provide any feedback, contact me on twitter @ctbikes or through email.

Thanks for taking this tour, and have a great time!
You are doing great! Click on that alarm icon, next to the star
First, select a station. To test it fast, just select any station with available bikes
Now, reveal the contextual menu by sliding across the green arrow in any direction
Show CityBikes Notifications Tour the next time you use the app
A help tour will be shown the next time you use this app
CityBikes on your city does not yet support C2DM Notifications, but will do soon!
Show CityBikes Help Tour the next time you use the app
You will be notified when there are ready bikes on this station!
